title: Mustapha Jarjue
jobTitle: Full-Stack Developer • Backend with Node.js / JavaScript
aboutText: I am a full-stack developer trained in a full-stack course where I built and deployed real projects on Render. I am currently expanding my backend skills by learning Java and Spring Boot.

project2Desc: Interactive JavaScript game demonstrating logic, event handling and interactive design. Deployed on Render.
